interface.name: dcc_domtrans_cdcc
interface.summary: Execute cdcc in the cdcc domain.

interface.name: dcc_run_cdcc
interface.summary: Execute cdcc in the cdcc domain, and allow the specified role the cdcc domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the cdcc domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the cdcc domain to use.

interface.name: dcc_domtrans_client
interface.summary: Execute dcc_client in the dcc_client domain.

interface.name: dcc_run_client
interface.summary: Execute dcc_client in the dcc_client domain, and allow the specified role the dcc_client domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the dcc_client domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the dcc_client domain to use.

interface.name: dcc_domtrans_dbclean
interface.summary: Execute dbclean in the dcc_dbclean domain.

interface.name: dcc_run_dbclean
interface.summary: Execute dbclean in the dcc_dbclean domain, and allow the specified role the dcc_dbclean domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the dcc_dbclean domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the dcc_dbclean domain to use.

interface.name: dcc_stream_connect_dccifd
interface.summary: Connect to dccifd over a unix domain stream socket.
